abstract: A dispute over marketing rights held by the biggest shareholder of the mining group Xstrata is threatening a possible $90 billion takeover by Brazil’s Companhia Vale do Rio Doce, Reuters reported citing an unnamed source.
lead_paragraph: A dispute over marketing rights held by the biggest shareholder of the mining group Xstrata is threatening a possible $90 billion takeover by Brazil’s Companhia Vale do Rio Doce, Reuters reported citing an unnamed source.

headline.main: Xstrata Investor Said to Threaten Vale Bid
